articles.title: Group of Koreans in Japan Here
articles.content:
Group of Koreans in Japan Here
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- A group of Koreans in Japan led by Kwon Sun Hwi, advisor to the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, arrived here Saturday by air to visit the socialist homeland for expressing thanks on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the repatriation of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: New Terms Come into Being in DPRK
articles.content:
New Terms Come into Being in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Lots of new terms reflecting the present time have come into being in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea this year replete with great changes. 
					When visiting an ostrich farm located in the suburbs of Pyongyang in early October, General Secretary Kim Jong Il told attendant officials that the farm had proved the justness of the Party's policy of turning the whole country into a thick woodland and greenery by planting a large number of trees. He then called it "patriot village", "patriot community" boasting of many people devotedly working for the country.
					
					 Since then new terms "patriot village" and "patriot community" have been in common use in the country.
					
					 The farm has been considered a model unit in the efforts for turning the country into a thick woodland and greenery.
					
					Some 100 ostrich pens, ostrich processing factory and other production buildings are enveloped by more than 560,000 trees of over 50 species, bearing a close resemblance to a huge arboretum or a rest centre.
					
					 In recent years working sites and rural villages have taken a new look with miracles and innovations being reported from throughout the country, entailing many new terms such as "serviceperson's modern house", "fish breeding girl of Kujang", "CNC", "Korea advances towards the world", "ostrich street" and "Huichon speed".

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Confrontation Racket Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Confrontation Racket Blasted
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday carries a commentator's article denouncing the south Korean authorities' racket of confrontation with the DPRK.
					 The article refers to the fact that there are an environment and atmosphere favorable for improving the inter-Korean relations thanks to a series of important measures taken by the DPRK recently for this purpose. 
					
					 The article cites facts to prove that the south Korean authorities took a very disappointing attitude though all the Koreans sincerely wished to see the north-south relations improved and a new chapter of reconciliation and cooperation opened.
					
					 The article continues:
					
					 Hyon In Thaek and his group in south Korea have persistently vociferated about the nuclear issue pursuant to the U.S. nuclear racket against the DPRK and become more desperate than ever before in their moves to hamstring the process for dialogue and cooperation for improving the inter-Korean relations. They went the lengths of abusing humanitarian issue for attaining their sinister purpose. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities including Hyon assert that there can be no improved relations unless the nuclear issue is settled. This is nothing but ridiculous sophism.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations have made steady progress thanks to the concerted efforts of the Koreans despite the reckless nuclear racket of the U.S. and its followers. They witnessed such events as two historic summits and the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, reunification programmes in the new century.
					
					 This proves that the nuclear issue can never be a hurdle in the way of improving the north-south relations and the DPRK's nuclear deterrent, a treasured sword of the nation, provides a sure guarantee for averting a war, preserving peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and ensuring smooth progress of the north-south relations. 
					
					 In a bid to justify their nuclear racket against the DPRK the south Korean authorities peddle a strange assertion that south Korea should become a party to the nuclear negotiations, claiming that it is allegedly exposed to a nuclear threat, and, therefore, it should get involved in the discussion of the nuclear issue from now on, not just following it. This is, indeed, a height of cynicism.
					
					 It is clear to everybody that the DPRK's nuclear deterrent is not targeted against fellow countrymen but aimed to cope with the U.S. nuclear threat.
					
					 This being a stark fact, the south Korean authorities raise a hue and cry over "the nuclear threat from the north" and the like. This is, in a nutshell, nothing but a declaration that they would come out as a hostile party to mount a nuclear attack on the DPRK alongside foreign forces under their "nuclear umbrella".
					
					 The south Korean authorities have neither face nor qualification nor right to meddle in the discussion of the nuclear issue.
					
					 The persistent accusation made by Hyon and his group against the DPRK over its nuclear deterrent is not truly aimed to seek a solution to the nuclear issue but to join foreign forces in their moves to force the DPRK to disarm itself, stoke confrontation with it and thus torpedo the process to improve the north-south relations.
					
					 Hyon and his group have seriously insulted and mocked at the DPRK under the pretext of a petty amount of humanitarian aid goods. They are running the whole gamut of plots to abuse humanitarian issues for their sinister political purposes after raising issues of "POWs of ROK Army" and "south Korean abductees." 
					
					 The POWs issue already found a solution at the time when the Korean Armistice Agreement was concluded and as for the issue of the "south Korean abductees," there are only those who defected to the north in quest of means of living. 
					
					 These facts clearly prove that by peddling humanitarian issues the group of the "Ministry of Unification" including Hyon only seeks to mislead public opinion, tarnish the image of the DPRK, force it to "change" itself and thus realize their pipe dream of bringing down its system.
					
					 Hyon and his group are not only deliberately standing in the way of improving the north-south relations but behaving like a dog in the manger, slandering and insulting those who are working hard for the improved inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations cannot be a monopoly of authorities under any circumstances. They can make progress on a right track as desired and wished by the nation only when people from all walks of life in the north and the south take an active part in the process to warm them.
					
					  Non-governmental figures are playing an increasing role at present and it has become a general world trend for them to solve those problems which the government authorities fail to do.
					
					 Hyon oft-repeats that "the south would not be pulled by the north" and it would "stick to its principle" but it goes without saying that his utterances are meant to persist in his sycophancy and treachery and pursue the wrong "north policy" of confrontation with fellow countrymen to the last.
					
					 It is ridiculous enough for Hyon to make such poor excuses as the "internal situation" while misinterpreting the DPRK's magnanimity and good faith for improving the north-south relations as gestures made by it due to "sanctions".
					
					 As far as "sanctions" are concerned, they may be fatal to pro-U.S. group relying on foreign forces but the people of the DPRK remain unfazed in face of such poor racket.
					
					 The DPRK sets store by the north-south relations but will never beg for their improvement.
					
					 It will respond to dialogue with dialogue and good faith in kind but will never pardon those who dare defile its dignity and seek confrontation with it.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not misjudge the magnanimity and good faith of the DPRK.

articles.title: Projected US-S. Korea Joint Air War Exercise under Fire
articles.content:
Projected US-S. Korea Joint Air War Exercise under Fire
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The 51st combat flying corps of the U.S. air force in south Korea and the 20th combat flying corps of the puppet air force plan to stage a joint air exercise codenamed Ssangmae from December 16 to 18, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 It was reported that during this saber rattling F-16s of the U.S. air force and KF-16s of the puppet air force would stage drills for reconnaissance and cooperation in air raids.
					
					 The U.S. warmongers claimed the projected exercise was aimed to strengthen the combat readiness to carry out a combined air operation.
					
					 This exercise is also reportedly designed to improve the exchange of intelligence between the U.S. and the puppet air forces and boost the capability for carrying out tactical and mutual operations, etc. This kind of drill was conducted in March this year when Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises were staged and several similar drills took place afterwards.
					
					 These madcap military exercises being staged by the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers to mount preemptive attacks on the DPRK are driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an extreme pitch of tension.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppets' Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket Censured
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppets' Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket Censured
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Ukraine Kim Yong Sul issued a statement on Dec. 9 denouncing the south Korean puppets for kicking up a "human rights" racket against the DPRK.
					 The statement accused the group of the Grand National Party of south Korea of having recently worked hard to adopt a "law on the human rights in the north" at the "National Assembly", adding that this is an intolerable politically motivated provocation as it is nothing but a sinister intention to tarnish the image of the dignified socialist system in the DPRK and push the confrontation of systems to an extreme pitch of tension.
					
					 If the ruling forces of south Korea are truly interested in the human rights issue, they should properly reflect on the human right abuses committed by them in south Korea, the statement urged, and went on:
					
					 The puppets, finding themselves in an extreme crisis, are seeking a way out of it in escalating the inter-Korean confrontation.
					
					 The moves to cook up such law can never be a way out for the traitorous ruling quarters.
					
					 They are sadly mistaken if they calculate they can achieve their political purpose through such ridiculous farce.
					
					 The confrontation-minded maniacs' anti-DPRK "human rights" row will only precipitate their self-destruction.
					
					 The confederation strongly demands the south Korean ruling forces stop at once the above-said racket aimed at escalating the confrontation and tension.

articles.title: Japanese Gov. Urged to Shape New DPRK Policy
articles.content:
Japanese Gov. Urged to Shape New DPRK Policy
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Representatives of the Liaison Council for Demanding Denuclearization and Peace in Northeast Asia and Normalization of the Relations between Japan and the DPRK which consists of Japanese civic organizations and figures of social strata submitted a letter of request to the Foreign Ministry of Japan urging the government to make a new decision on its DPRK policy on Dec. 1.
					 They in the letter expressed concern over the talks for the normalization of bilateral relations that have made no progress till today even though seven years have passed since the adoption of the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration. They criticized the former government of the Liberal Democratic Party for having pursued the hostile policy toward the DPRK and urged the new government to actively come forth for the negotiations with the DPRK now that new phase is being opened in the situation of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 They also urged the Japanese government to clarify the need to resume the talks for the normalization of bilateral relations based on the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration, express once again at the government level the stand of Japan ready to make apology for and repentance of its colonial rule in 2010, the centenary of the fabrication of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty", resume the humanitarian assistance to the DPRK, stop the suppression of the Koreans in Japan and take a measure to ensure their rights.

articles.title: Dismantlement of Concrete Wall Demanded in Mexico
articles.content:
Dismantlement of Concrete Wall Demanded in Mexico
 Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- Nine political parties and organizations in Mexico including the People's Socialist Party of Mexico and the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association in their joint statement issued on Dec. 5 demanded the south Korean authorities pull down the concrete wall built in the area of the south side along the Military Demarcation Line under the U.S. patronage. 
					 The joint statement said:
					
					 The concrete wall, a leftover of the Korean division, is still standing, touching off strong rebuff and towering resentment among the world progressive people aspiring after the independent reunification of Korea.
					
					  The statement bitterly denounced the anti-reunification and treacherous acts of the U.S., the sworn enemy of the Korean people, and the south Korean authorities who are twisting the truth of the concrete wall dividing Korea into the north and the south and keeping it still today despite the unanimous rebuff and condemnation of the world public circles.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The U.S. should admit the stark existence of the concrete wall and feel full responsibility for the division of Korea.
					
					 We strongly urge the U.S. to roll back its anachronistic policy aimed to perpetuate the division of Korea by escalating the confrontation with compatriots at any cost and the south Korean authorities to make a bold decision to dismantle the concrete wall.
					
					 We call upon the political parties, governments and organizations of the world aspiring after Korea's reunification to expose and denounce the U.S. and the south Korean authorities' anti-reunification policy aimed at perpetuating the division and escalating the confrontation while keeping the concrete wall still today though three decades have passed since its construction, exercise their influence on them so that it may be pulled down as early as possible and powerfully support and encourage the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in their struggle to achieve the independent reunification of the country under the banner of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Bulletin Issued in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Bulletin Issued in Ethiopia
Pyongyang, December 12 (KCNA) -- The Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea released the fourth issue of its bulletin on the occasions of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 92nd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Brilliant Commander Kim Jong Il" said that his army leadership mode is most essentially characterized by his energetic field inspection.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is the brilliant commander who brings the enemies to their knees without firing a single bullet with his matchless courage and pluck, the bulletin said, adding that the army and the people of the DPRK will always emerge victorious as they have him as supreme commander.
					
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Time-honored Hoeryong" noted in detail that Kim Jong Suk took part in the anti-Japanese armed struggle led by President Kim Il Sung and earned her fame as anti-Japanese heroine. 
					
					 Her desire was to build powerful and prosperous Korea where the people live with nothing to desire more in the world, the bulletin stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige fabrica de elaboracion de cereales
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige fabrica de elaboracion de cereales
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la reconstruida Fabrica de Elaboracion de Cereales de Pyongyang.
					Guiado por los funcionarios directivos de la fabrica, el recorrio la lapida con instrucciones dadas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung al visitarla y el monumento en memoria de su visita de orientacion, la sala de educacion en objetos y datos historico-revolucionarios y la de presentacion del historial.
					
					El Presidente ilumino claramente el camino a seguir por la fabrica dirigiendola 15 veces en el terreno desde que la visito por primera vez el 24 de septiembre de 1945, poco despues de su retorno a la patria tras liberar el pais.
					
					Al evocar con mucha emocion la orgullosa trayectoria del desarrollo de la fabrica, dijo que ella se ha convertido en una base de elaboracion alimentaria de gran tamano bajo la sabia direccion y esmerada atencion del Presidente.
					
					Seguidamente, estuvo en varios talleres informandose concretamente del estado de reconstruccion, reparacion y produccion.
					
					Evaluo a la clase obrera de la fabrica que acabo en un corto tiempo la reconstruccion y la reparacion con sus propias fuerzas y trabaja intensamente para aumentar la produccion de los confites de varios generos y otros comestibles que avienen al paladar del pueblo coreano.
					
					Presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la administracion de la fabrica subrayando que ella ocupa un lugar importante en el mejoramiento de la vida alimentaria de los capitalinos.
					
					Enseno que el problema de suministrar a los capitalinos mas confites y otros alimentos o no depende totalmente del papel de esta fabrica y destaco que la tarea mas importante de esta es realizar en un alto nivel la modernizacion y la cientifizacion de los procesos de produccion.
					
					Dijo que numerosas fabricas y empresas de todo el pais incluyendo la provincia de Jagang y la de Phyong-an del Norte avanzan ahora a una velocidad vertiginosa superando la tecnica de punta gracias a la introduccion brillante de la tecnologia CNC y presento las tareas combativas para terminar cuanto antes la modernizacion de ella conforme a la demanda de la era de IT.
					
					Para acondicionar esta fabrica como la moderna y ejemplar de procesamiento de alimentos basada en la ciencia y tecnica de punta, los funcionarios y los tecnicos de ella deben hacer sus proyectos con mucha ambicion y vision innovadora y ponerlos en practica con tenacidad, senalo y subrayo que al mismo tiempo, las universidades inclusive la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek y otros organos de investigacion cientifica deben ayudar esa faena con responsabilidad dando por los suyos los asuntos de esta fabrica.
					
					Destaco que hay que establecer minuciosamente las medidas para asegurar las materias primas a fin de normalizar la produccion en un alto nivel e ilumino la direccion y los remedios detallados para el respecto.
					
					Encomendo encarecidamente a los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la fabrica que cumplan plenamente su honrosa mision para facilitar cuanto antes a nuestro pueblo una vida mas abundante.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Choe Yong Rim, el secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, Pak Nam Gi y Jang Song Thaek, y la vicepremiera del Consejo de Ministros, Pak Myong Son.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recorre el Centro de Piscinas de Universidad Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recorre el Centro de Piscinas de Universidad Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del  Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio el ejercicio de natacion de los profesores, empleados y estudiantes de la Universidad Kim Il Sung en el Centro de Piscinas construido en esta institucion docente.
					  Al mirar a los profesores y empleados nadando llenos de optimismo en amplias piscinas, se mostro muy satisfecho de que todos de la universidad se forjaran fisicamente y tomaran el descanso cultural en lo suficiente usando el centro de piscinas.
					
					  Dijo con emocion cuanto se alegraria el Presidente Kim Il Sung, quien en toda su vida, prestaba mucha atencion a la educacion de las nuevas generaciones, si viera este aspecto orgulloso de los profesores, empleados y estudiantes gozando de su felicidad en este centro de maximo nivel.
					
					  La natacion es el deporte muy bueno para el fomento de la constitucion fisica y la salud del hombre, subrayo e ilumino las tareas y remedios para masificarla.
					
					  Hay que administrar y cuidar este centro que deviene un patrimonio eterno para las posteridades, enseno y tomo las medidas benevolas volviendo a informarse de los problemas pormenorizados del centro.
					
					  Durante mas de 60 anos, esta universidad formo a numerosos talentosos revolucionarios en el fragor de la ardua lucha revolucionaria y cumplio asi excelentemente su papel medular en la materializacion de la orientacion de formar a los cuadros nacionales y la de la intelectualizacion de toda la sociedad, menciono.
					
					   Evaluo altamente las brillantes proezas logradas por el plantel docente especificando que sus graduados cumplen ahora excelentemente el papel de vanguardia en todos los lugares de construccion de una patria prospera incluyendo la introduccion de la tecnologia CNC al estilo jucheano.
					
					  Hay que formar bien como talentosos revolucionarios que posean ricos conocimientos, nobles virtudes y buena salud a nuestros estudiantes quienes son tesoros encargados del futuro de la patria, apunto y enfatizo que hay que prestar siempre profunda atencion a la vida de ellos.
					
					  Al enterarse del estado de la biblioteca de la universidad en plena construccion, apunto que se debe terminar esta obra en el maximo nivel para legarla cuanto antes a las posteridades.
					
					  Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que al igual que antes, los profesores, empleados y estudiantes de la Universidad Kim Il Sung seguiran cumpliendo excelentemente en lo adelante tambien su mision y deber importantes y honrosos para dar mas dignidad y honor a este plantel denominado con el nombre del Presidente.
					
					  El Dirigente fue acompanado en esta ocasion por los secretarios del CC del PTC, Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, y los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek y Pak Nam Gi.

articles.title: Comentarista de Rodong Sinmun denuncia campana anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Comentarista de Rodong Sinmun denuncia campana anti-RPDC
  Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun inserto el dia 12 el articulo del comentarista, que condena la campana lanzada por las autoridades surcoreanas en busca de la confrontacion con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  En estos dias, se dieron las circunstancias y la atmosfera, favorables al mejoramiento de las relaciones Norte-Sur de Corea gracias a una serie de medidas importantes tomadas por la RPDC para mejorarlas, comienza el comentarista y prosigue:
					
					  Pero, resulto muy decepcionante la actitud de las autoridades surcoreanas en contraste con la aspiracion de todos los coreanos que desean sinceramente que se abra la nueva pagina de reconciliacion y cooperacion como producto del relajamiento de las tensas relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					  Sumandose a la campana anti-RPDC lanzada por Estados Unidos en el campo nuclear, Hyon In Thaek y sus compinches del Sur de Corea cuestionan obstinadamente el problema nuclear, obstaculizan de peor manera el dialogo y la cooperacion para mejorar las relaciones N-S y malemplean los problemas humanitarios en sus siniestros objetivos.
					
					  No pasa de ser una sofisteria la palabreria de las autoridades surcoreanas como Hyon In Thaek de que no habra el mejoramiento de las relaciones antes de que fuera solucionado el problema nuclear.
					
					  Aun en medio de esa imprudente campana nuclear de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites, las relaciones N-S vinieron desarrollandose dinamicamente por las fuerzas unidas de la nacion, tuvo lugar dos veces la historica cumbre intercoreana y se registraron grandes eventos como la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programas de reunificacion del nuevo siglo.
					
					  Este hecho comprobo que el problema nuclear no es un obstaculo para las relaciones N-S y la fuerza nuclear disuasoria de la RPDC, arma omnipotente de la nacion, es precisamente la garantia para prevenir la guerra y mantener la paz y la seguridad en la Peninsula Coreana y desarrollar sin problemas las relaciones N-S.
					
					  Para justificar dicha campana, las autoridades surcoreanas presentaron esa extrana y ridicula teoria de que ellas deben ser una parte de las negociaciones nucleares porque son sometidas a la amenaza nuclear, exactamente dicho, han de participar desde ahora en los debates del problema nuclear dejando de andar en la zaga.
					
					  Hasta los ninos saben que la fuerza nuclear disuasoria de la RPDC no apunta a los connacionales sino sirve para hacer frente a la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					  A pesar de eso, las autoridades surcoreanas hablan mucho de la "amenaza nuclear proveniente del Norte de Corea". Esto es igual que declarar que se ofreceran como una parte hostil que escudada por el "paraguas nuclear" que le brindan las fuerzas extranjeras, trata de lanzar con estas el ataque nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					  Las autoridades surcoreanas no tienen ni cara ni calidad ni facultad para meterse en los debates del problema nuclear
					
					  El hecho de que Hyon In Thaek y su banda censuran obstinadamente la fuerza nuclear disuasoria de la RPDC no parte del intento de resolver de veras el problema nuclear sino del siniestro objetivo de desarmar a la RPDC en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras y romper las relaciones N-S fomentando el enfrentamiento.
					
					  Ellos ofenden y se burlan gravemente de su contraparte con una cantidad insignificante de materiales de cooperacion humanitaria y recurren a todos los medios para usar los problemas humanitarios en sus malsanos objetivos politicos planteando el problema de supuestos "prisioneros del ejercito surcoreano" y "secuestrados por el Norte".
					
					  Este primer asunto ya quedo resuelto completamente durante la firma del Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea.
					
					En cuanto al segundo, en la RPDC hay los que pasaron a esta por causas justas y voluntariamente, pero no existe ningun secuestrado por ella. 
					
					   Claro esta que los compinches del "Ministerio de Reunificacion" como Hyon plantean el problema humanitario para enturbiar la imagen de la RPDC al enganar a la opinion publica y realizar su ilusion del enfrentamiento entre sistemas sociales al "transformar" a alguien.
					
					  La banda de Hyon obstaculiza intencionalmente el desarrollo de las relaciones N-S por una parte y por la otra, censura e insulta aviesamente a los que se mueven activamente para ese fin.
					
					  Las relaciones N-S no pueden ser monopolizadas en ningun caso por las autoridades sino avanzaran correctamente conforme a la opinion y aspiracion de la nacion solo con la participacion activa de amplios sectores y capas del Norte y el Sur.
					
					  Hoy en dia, el papel de los civiles se eleva cada dia mas, y deviene una tendencia universal del mundo el que aquellos resuelven los problemas que no pueden solucionar las autoridades gubernamentales.
					
					  Hyon dice a menudo que "no se movera siguiendo al Norte" y "mantendra los principios". Estas palabras no persiguen otro objetivo que insistir hasta el final en su erronea "politica sobre el Norte" de caracter vendepatria y servil a grandes potencias y en pro de la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					  Es muy ridicula la conducta de Hyon quien habla mucho de la "situacion interna" pensando equivocadamente como si la indulgencia y la buena fe de la RPDC para el mejoramiento de las relaciones con el Sur de Corea fueran resultados de la "sancion".
					
					  Quizas le sera mortal esta "sancion" a esa camarilla proyanqui que vive dependiendo de las fuerzas extranjeras, pero el pueblo de la RPDC no se amilana ni un apice ante esa campana barata.
					
					  La RPDC aprecia las relaciones N-S, pero no las mendigara jamas.
					
					  Ella respondera con el dialogo al dialogo y con la buena voluntad a la buena voluntad. Pero, no perdonara ni en lo minimo a los tipejos que ofendan su dignidad y persigan el enfrentamiento.
					
					  Las autoridades surcoreanas no deben equivocarse de la magnanimidad y la buena fe de la RPDC.

articles.title: Entidad de coreanos en Ucrania condena campana anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Entidad de coreanos en Ucrania condena campana anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 12 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El presidente de la Asociacion Ucrania de Coreanos (unidad), Kim Yong Sul, publico el dia 9 una declaracion criticando la intrigante campana anti- Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que lanzan los titeres surcoreanos en la esfera de derechos humanos.
					Tras referirse a que ultimamente, los compinches del "Gran Partido Nacional" del Sur de Corea tratan de aprobar el llamado "proyecto de ley de derechos humanos del Norte (de Corea)" en la "Asamblea Nacional", la nota denuncia que esto deviene una provocacion politica nunca perdonable para mellar la imagen del muy digno regimen socialista de la RPDC y agravar al extremo la confrontacion entre sistemas sociales.
					
					Si las fuerzas en el poder del Sur de Corea estan interesadas de veras en el problema de DDHH, tendran que reflexionar correctamente de sus crimenes violatorios de DDHH cometidos en suelo surcoreano, apunta y prosigue:
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos, caidos en la crisis extrema, buscan la salida de ella en la agravacion de la confrontacion entre el Norte y el Sur.
					
					Pero, la aprobacion del "proyecto de ley de derechos humanos del Norte" no puede ser en ningun caso la salvacion de ellos.
					
					Estaran muy equivocados si ellos piensan que podrian alcanzar sus metas politicas con esa tonteria.
					
					Tal campana anti-RPDC de esos maniacos de confrontacion les adelantara la autodestruccion.
					
					La Asociacion Ucrania de Coreanos (unidad) demanda fuertemente a los gobernantes surcoreanos que paren ahora mismo esa campana, que agrava la confrontacion y la tension.
